description:
Using the following credentials to Sign In
email address: p.s.farwaha@gmail.com
password: GeckDemo05

Make sure user lands on the home page

Go to properties, and search for multifamily appartments located in Sunnyvale.

Validate that there is only one result.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the https://www.marcusmillichap.com/ website.
Click on the Sign In/Out button to display the login form.
Enter the email address 'p.s.farwaha@gmail.com' in the email field.
Click the Continue button to proceed and reveal the password field.
Enter the password 'GeckDemo05' in the password field.
Click the Sign In button to log into the application.
Verify that the home page is displayed by checking for the text 'Global Reach, Local Expertise'.
Navigate to the Properties section by selecting the appropriate properties link or icon.
Click on the filter or search icon within the properties section to display search options.
Enter 'multifamily apartments' as the property type and 'Sunnyvale' as the location in the search filters.
Execute the search for properties using the applied filters.
Validate that the search results display exactly one property listing.
Take a screenshot of the completed task to confirm the test outcome.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, navigate properties, search and validate result
